item.title: #日本公司制造的一枚火箭在周三发射后发生爆炸，日本公共广播公司（NHK）播放了火箭爆炸的画面。

item.title: 随着海水上升，哥伦比亚的加勒比海明珠正在慢慢下沉。全世界的低洼地区都处于应对气候危机的前沿阵地，卡塔赫纳的脆弱程度可想而知。
item.description:
Colombia's Caribbean jewel slowly sinking as sea waters rise.

With low-lying communities worldwide on the front lines of the climate crisis fight, Cartagena is conspicuously vulnerablehttps://t.co/kOx5JiuREn pic.twitter.com/X48BsRatPQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 13, 2024

item.title: 女王芭比娃娃。芭比娃娃可能没有在奥斯卡颁奖典礼上获奖，但她获得了卡米拉女王的皇室认可，卡米拉女王是不朽的标志性娃娃之一。

Queen Barbie.

item.title: 在包括佐治亚州在内的初选投票中，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在各自的总统提名竞选中均取得了不可撼动的领先优势。
item.description:
Joe Biden and Donald Trump eyed unassailable leads in their separate presidential nomination races in primary voting that included Georgia -- a US swing state where Trump faces trial over an alleged conspiracy to steal the last election.https://t.co/GsRp2jaaQs pic.twitter.com/kxqhTYjNmr

item.title: PGA 巡回赛负责人杰伊-莫纳汉（Jay Monahan）表示，与 LIV Golf 公司沙特阿拉伯支持者的谈判正在 "加速进行"，但他对两家机构之间拟议的合资企业将如何运作守口如瓶。
item.description:

item.title: 法国总理加布里埃尔-阿塔尔（Gabriel Attal）向议会表示，乌克兰抗击俄罗斯入侵的斗争已经到了 "临界点"，并警告说，如果俄罗斯击败基辅军队，法国将面临 "真正、切实的危险"。
item.description:
French Prime Minister Gabriel Attal told parliament that Ukraine's fight against the Russian invasion had hit a "tipping point", warning of "real, tangible dangers" for France should Russia defeat Kyiv's forces.https://t.co/RzQJphk3ED pic.twitter.com/4p4Kueqxev

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 英国《每日邮报》是王室的忠实拥护者，当它以 "凯特照片是如何成为公关灾难的？

item.title: 据意大利媒体周二报道，拉齐奥主教练毛里齐奥-萨里已经辞职，原因是球队糟糕的状态让这支意甲球队在欧洲足坛的竞争中落于下风 ➡️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Lazio coach Maurizio Sarri has resigned after a poor run of form left the Serie A team off the pace in the race for European football, Italian media reported on Tuesday ➡️ https://t.co/ugNxZulTX3 #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/PiSGmr3t8w

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 曼联中场梅森-蒙特因小腿伤势休战四个月后于周二恢复训练，自他以 6000 万英镑（7600 万美元）从切尔西转会至曼联以来，他只出场了 12 次 ⬇️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Manchester United midfielder Mason Mount returned to training on Tuesday after four months out with a calf injury, having made just 12 appearances since his £60 million ($76 million) transfer from Chelsea ⬇️ https://t.co/TFBhJGjJMG #AFPSports

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 塞尔塔维戈在接连遭遇糟糕战绩后于周二解雇了主教练拉法-贝尼特斯（Rafa Benitez），目前加利西亚人在西甲排名第 17 位，比降级区高出两分 ⬇️ #AFPSports

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 日本西部一个城市的当地居民被告知不要接近或触摸一只失踪的猫，它掉进了一个装有危险化学品的大桶里，然后在夜色中四处逃窜 ➡️
item.description:
Locals in a city in western Japan have been told not to approach or touch a missing cat that fell into a vat of dangerous chemicals and then scampered off into the night ➡️ https://t.co/OT3Ye33a6F pic.twitter.com/TEi1TdnzZo

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024
